GlobalChangeSpec.Name: Add System Roles To App User Global Change
GlobalChangeSpec.Description: Add System Roles To App User Global Change
GlobalChangeSpec.Author: HEIFERNET\khamling
GlobalChangeSpec.DisplayName: Add System Roles To App User Global Change
GlobalChangeSpec.CreateProcedureSQL:
create procedure dbo.USR_USP_GLOBALCHANGE_ADD_SYSTEMROLE_TO_APPUSER ( @CHANGEAGENTID uniqueidentifier = null, @ASOF as datetime = null, @NUMBERADDED int = 0 output, @NUMBEREDITED int = 0 output, @NUMBERDELETED int = 0 output, @SYSTEMROLEID uniqueidentifier, @SYSTEMROLEID2 uniqueidentifier, @SYSTEMROLEID3 uniqueidentifier, @SYSTEMROLEID4 uniqueidentifier, @SYSTEMROLEID5 uniqueidentifier, @SYSTEMROLEID6 uniqueidentifier, @SYSTEMROLEID7 uniqueidentifier, @SYSTEMROLEID8 uniqueidentifier, @SYSTEMROLEID9 uniqueidentifier, @SYSTEMROLEID10 uniqueidentifier, @APPUSERSELECTIONID UNIQUEIDENTIFIER ) as set nocount off;
declare @CURRENTDATE datetime set @CURRENTDATE = getdate(); set @NUMBERADDED = 0; set @NUMBEREDITED = 0; set @NUMBERDELETED = 0;
if @CHANGEAGENTID is null exec dbo.USP_CHANGEAGENT_GETORCREATECHANGEAGENT @CHANGEAGENTID output;
begin try -- do the global change operation here, and set @NUMBERADDED, @NUMBEREDITED, and/or @NUMBERDELETED as appropriate DECLARE @APPUSERSELECTION TABLE ( id UNIQUEIDENTIFIER PRIMARY KEY);
INSERT INTO @APPUSERSELECTION SELECT id FROM dbo.Ufn_idsetreader_getresults_guid(@APPUSERSELECTIONID)
if @SYSTEMROLEID is not null begin insert into systemroleappuser ( systemroleid, appuserid, addedbyid, changedbyid, dateadded, datechanged, fromrolesync, securitymodecode, constituentsecuritymodecode, accountingelementsecuritymodecode ) select @SYSTEMROLEID, id, @CHANGEAGENTID, @CHANGEAGENTID, @CURRENTDATE, @CURRENTDATE, 0, 0, 0, 0 from @APPUSERSELECTION where id not in (select appuserid from systemroleappuser where systemroleid=@SYSTEMROLEID)
set @NUMBERADDED = @@rowcount + @NUMBERADDED end
if @SYSTEMROLEID2 is not null begin insert into systemroleappuser ( systemroleid, appuserid, addedbyid, changedbyid, dateadded, datechanged, fromrolesync, securitymodecode, constituentsecuritymodecode, accountingelementsecuritymodecode ) select @SYSTEMROLEID2, id, @CHANGEAGENTID, @CHANGEAGENTID, @CURRENTDATE, @CURRENTDATE, 0, 0, 0, 0 from @APPUSERSELECTION where id not in (select appuserid from systemroleappuser where systemroleid=@SYSTEMROLEID2)
set @NUMBERADDED = @@rowcount + @NUMBERADDED end
if @SYSTEMROLEID3 is not null begin insert into systemroleappuser ( systemroleid, appuserid, addedbyid, changedbyid, dateadded, datechanged, fromrolesync, securitymodecode, constituentsecuritymodecode, accountingelementsecuritymodecode ) select @SYSTEMROLEID3, id, @CHANGEAGENTID, @CHANGEAGENTID, @CURRENTDATE, @CURRENTDATE, 0, 0, 0, 0 from @APPUSERSELECTION where id not in (select appuserid from systemroleappuser where systemroleid=@SYSTEMROLEID3)
set @NUMBERADDED = @@rowcount + @NUMBERADDED end
if @SYSTEMROLEID4 is not null begin insert into systemroleappuser ( systemroleid, appuserid, addedbyid, changedbyid, dateadded, datechanged, fromrolesync, securitymodecode, constituentsecuritymodecode, accountingelementsecuritymodecode ) select @SYSTEMROLEID4, id, @CHANGEAGENTID, @CHANGEAGENTID, @CURRENTDATE, @CURRENTDATE, 0, 0, 0, 0 from @APPUSERSELECTION where id not in (select appuserid from systemroleappuser where systemroleid=@SYSTEMROLEID4)
set @NUMBERADDED = @@rowcount + @NUMBERADDED end
if @SYSTEMROLEID5 is not null begin insert into systemroleappuser ( systemroleid, appuserid, addedbyid, changedbyid, dateadded, datechanged, fromrolesync, securitymodecode, constituentsecuritymodecode, accountingelementsecuritymodecode ) select @SYSTEMROLEID5, id, @CHANGEAGENTID, @CHANGEAGENTID, @CURRENTDATE, @CURRENTDATE, 0, 0, 0, 0 from @APPUSERSELECTION where id not in (select appuserid from systemroleappuser where systemroleid=@SYSTEMROLEID5)
set @NUMBERADDED = @@rowcount + @NUMBERADDED end
if @SYSTEMROLEID6 is not null begin insert into systemroleappuser ( systemroleid, appuserid, addedbyid, changedbyid, dateadded, datechanged, fromrolesync, securitymodecode, constituentsecuritymodecode, accountingelementsecuritymodecode ) select @SYSTEMROLEID6, id, @CHANGEAGENTID, @CHANGEAGENTID, @CURRENTDATE, @CURRENTDATE, 0, 0, 0, 0 from @APPUSERSELECTION where id not in (select appuserid from systemroleappuser where systemroleid=@SYSTEMROLEID6)
set @NUMBERADDED = @@rowcount + @NUMBERADDED end
if @SYSTEMROLEID7 is not null begin insert into systemroleappuser ( systemroleid, appuserid, addedbyid, changedbyid, dateadded, datechanged, fromrolesync, securitymodecode, constituentsecuritymodecode, accountingelementsecuritymodecode ) select @SYSTEMROLEID7, id, @CHANGEAGENTID, @CHANGEAGENTID, @CURRENTDATE, @CURRENTDATE, 0, 0, 0, 0 from @APPUSERSELECTION where id not in (select appuserid from systemroleappuser where systemroleid=@SYSTEMROLEID7)
set @NUMBERADDED = @@rowcount + @NUMBERADDED end
if @SYSTEMROLEID8 is not null begin insert into systemroleappuser ( systemroleid, appuserid, addedbyid, changedbyid, dateadded, datechanged, fromrolesync, securitymodecode, constituentsecuritymodecode, accountingelementsecuritymodecode ) select @SYSTEMROLEID8, id, @CHANGEAGENTID, @CHANGEAGENTID, @CURRENTDATE, @CURRENTDATE, 0, 0, 0, 0 from @APPUSERSELECTION where id not in (select appuserid from systemroleappuser where systemroleid=@SYSTEMROLEID8)
set @NUMBERADDED = @@rowcount + @NUMBERADDED end
if @SYSTEMROLEID9 is not null begin insert into systemroleappuser ( systemroleid, appuserid, addedbyid, changedbyid, dateadded, datechanged, fromrolesync, securitymodecode, constituentsecuritymodecode, accountingelementsecuritymodecode ) select @SYSTEMROLEID9, id, @CHANGEAGENTID, @CHANGEAGENTID, @CURRENTDATE, @CURRENTDATE, 0, 0, 0, 0 from @APPUSERSELECTION where id not in (select appuserid from systemroleappuser where systemroleid=@SYSTEMROLEID9)
set @NUMBERADDED = @@rowcount + @NUMBERADDED end
if @SYSTEMROLEID10 is not null begin insert into systemroleappuser ( systemroleid, appuserid, addedbyid, changedbyid, dateadded, datechanged, fromrolesync, securitymodecode, constituentsecuritymodecode, accountingelementsecuritymodecode ) select @SYSTEMROLEID10, id, @CHANGEAGENTID, @CHANGEAGENTID, @CURRENTDATE, @CURRENTDATE, 0, 0, 0, 0 from @APPUSERSELECTION where id not in (select appuserid from systemroleappuser where systemroleid=@SYSTEMROLEID10)
set @NUMBERADDED = @@rowcount + @NUMBERADDED end
end try begin catch exec dbo.USP_RAISE_ERROR; return 1; end catch
